ygData.subject: Re: Hi all
ygData.msgSnippet: ... drop there, maybe I will convince my group of friends to hunt their in the future. We are going to Permafrost tonight, I am scared to death of losing all
ygData.messageBody:
--- In EverQuest@y..., "J. Smythe" <lgumaer@h...> wrote:
> I was just looking at some decent ranger 2-hand blunt weapons that
drop there, maybe I will convince my group of friends to hunt their
in the future. We are going to Permafrost tonight, I am scared to
death of losing all my stuff.
> ----- Original Message -----
> From: Nygaard, Jeff
> To: EverQuest@y...
> Sent: Tuesday, April 09, 2002 8:50 AM
> Subject: RE: [EverQuest] Hi all

2h blunt for Rangers is generally a waste of time. If you want to
build it up just to you did that's fine. The Ranger Epics are 2
swords, meant for dual wielding. So the "vision" is for Rangers to
use dual wield all the time. That's what makes them different from
the Knights.

Tuldayen
35th Season Ranger of Tunare
